item.title: Award for Pendle man two years after launching his own business CRB Coatings North West
item.description: Taking a chance on launching his own company has paid off for a young Pendle dad who has won an award for his hard work. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Excel Fostering appealing for foster families in Burnley and Pendle
item.description: A fostering agency is urging people across Burnley and Pendle to consider opening their homes to children and young people in care. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Nelson man arrested on suspicion of exposure to teenage girl
item.description: A 29-year-old man has been arrested on suspicion of exposing himself to a teenage girl close to the Nelson-Burnley border. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Man arrested on suspicion of murder after 'unexplained' death of Nelson woman found in flat
item.description: A man has been arrested on suspicion of murder after the ‘unexplained’ death of a woman in a flat in East Lancashire. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Police investigating reports of a man exposing himself close to the Nelson and Burnley border
item.description: Police are investigating reports that a man exposed himself to a teenage girl close to the Nelson-Burnley border. Source: Burnley Express

item.title: Charity box stolen from Nelson mosque in daytime theft
item.description: A charity box containing around £40 was stolen from a mosque in Nelson in a daytime theft. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Residents to be consulted on proposed plans for 3G football pitch and BMX race track at Nelson's Hodge House playing fields
item.description: Residents living close to playing fields in Nelson are to be asked for their views on proposals to create a 3G football pitch and BMX race track on the site. Source: Burnley Express
